title: BRIEF-Suncorp Group Says Making Good Progress On Critical Areas Of Regulatory Requirements
text:
© Reuters. BRIEF-Suncorp Group Says Making Good Progress On Critical Areas Of Regulatory Requirements

Sept 26 (Reuters) - Suncorp Group Ltd :

* SAYS HAS BEEN FOCUSSED ON REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS AND IS MAKING GOOD PROGRESS ON CRITICAL AREAS

* SAYS HAS ALREADY IMPLEMENTED SEVERAL RECOMMENDATIONS IDENTIFIED BY THE ROYAL COMMISSION

* SAYS HAS ALSO IMPLEMENTED RECOMMENDATIONS BY ITS OWN RISK GOVERNANCE SELF-ASSESSMENT TO APRA AND REVIEWS CONDUCTED BY NZ REGULATORS

* SAYS BOARD WILL BE SEEKING SHAREHOLDER APPROVAL TO DISTRIBUTE REMAINING SURPLUS CAPITAL FROM SALE OF AUSTRALIAN LIFE BUSINESS

* SAYS DISTRIBUTION, THAT'S PENDING APPROVAL, WILL BE IN THE FORM OF 39 CENTSPER SHARE RETURN OF CAPITAL WITH RELATED SHARE CONSOLIDATION
